#summary param element

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *param element*

== Usage ==

The param element defines a parameter in an [ObjectElement embedded object].

== Attributes ==

  * [ParamNameAttribute name]
  * [ParamTypeAttribute type]
  * [ParamValueAttribute value]
  * [ParamValuetypeAttribute valuetype]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
